title: More broken.. Karthus and Kayn in URF or RiTOs servers atm??

replies.body:
Oh man, I've yet to see Kayn in ARURF but hot dang I bet he's fun xD!

Yea about those patching servers.....everything should be cleared up and good to go now! Try logging back in if you haven't and let our tech guys know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having problems!
